job_detail.textContent:
Key Responsibilities

  • Write clean, tested, efficient, and simple code
  • Design and development in MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express, AngularJS, Node.js)
  • Ability to take broad requirements and come up with elegant solutions while balancing frontend usability, orthogonality, and time constraints.
  • Actively participate in SCRUM meetings, quality assurance, code reviews and other development team activities

Essential Skills

  • Mastery of Javascript, both on client and server side.
  • Strong knowledge of MongoDB.
  • Familiarity with design patterns, Express JS, other modern MVC frameworks.
  • Strong knowledge of AngularJs, jQuery, Twitter Bootstrap, Less, CSS3, HTML5.
  • Working knowledge of Linux / MAC.
  • Working knowledge of Web Services(AWS is a plus), APIs.
  • Working knowledge of Test Driven Development.
  • Curious mind, desire to learn, passion for excellence and perfection.

Preferred Skills

  • Experience working in an agile environment.
  • Experience building real-time and high performance, scalable cloud applications.
  • Familiarity with Grunt, Gulp, Bower, Karma, Protractor, Jasmine, Git/SVN.
  • Exposure or interest in Hadoop, Graph based Databases, Big Data.
  • Eye for design, ability to design smooth and minimal user interfaces.
